# 🚀 Project Name: **NextGen Dashboard**

Welcome to the **NextGen Dashboard** documentation — your ultimate guide to mastering the modern, minimal, and blazing-fast UI experience.

---

## ✨ Features

- 🔥 **Live Metrics** — real-time updates using WebSockets.
- 📊 **Analytics Dashboard** — visual insights with interactive charts.
- 🔐 **Secure Authentication** — OAuth + JWT combo.
- 🎨 **Fully Customizable UI** — Tailwind + Theme support.

---

## 📦 Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/example/nextgen-dashboard.git
cd nextgen-dashboard
pnpm install
pnpm dev
```

> 💡 _Make sure Node.js >= 18.0 is installed._

---

## 📁 Folder Structure

```plaintext
├── components/
│   ├── Header.tsx
│   └── Sidebar.tsx
├── pages/
│   ├── index.tsx
│   └── dashboard.tsx
├── styles/
│   └── globals.css
```

---

## 🧱 Tech Stack

| Tech       | Description                    |
|------------|--------------------------------|
| Next.js    | React Framework                |
| Tailwind   | Utility-first CSS              |
| Zustand    | State Management               |
| Chart.js   | Data Visualization             |
| Prisma     | ORM for Database Integration   |

---

### 🛠 API Endpoints

#### GET `/api/stats`

Fetches user stats.

```json
{
  "users": 1278,
  "active": 963
}
```

#### POST `/api/feedback`

Submit user feedback.

```json
{
  "message": "Great experience!",
  "rating": 5
}
```
